jd: From: John Joseph, IDC Technologies john.joseph@idctechnologies.com Reply to: john.joseph@idctechnologies.com Top Skills & Years of Experience Required:- Collect data, explore it, repair it- Train a model on the data- Evaluate the model of performance and be able to improve it Full Job Description: Position Title: Business Analyst 5 Justification: Provide presentations, reports, statistics, metrics, and analysis of services provided by Network Services Short Description: Receive, process, present data, and information from our weekly Helix datasets which are provided from another I&O division. Complete Description: Extrapolate datasets from Service Desk Support Team and prepare using appropriate algorithm tools Ability to obtain and report data analysis of datasets Facilitate meetings to discuss data analysis of workloads and projects Excellent interpersonal skills Skills, Experience and Education: Bachelors Degree, Required Organization and Prioritization skills are Mandatory Understanding CRISP-DM process model Ability to follow the steps for a data mining project Business Understanding Data understanding Data preparation Modeling Evaluation Deployment Communication and Interpersonal skills are Mandatory Previous experience working with multiple agencies and/or vendors and/or departments in an enterprise environment are Required Experience with PBI, R, IBM SPSS, and/or Tableau Experience with Microsoft Project and Excel is Required Experience with DevOPs is Preferred Experience with Remedy/Helix is Required Experience working within a Telecommunications environment is Preferred Experience in a large Enterprise setting is Required Experience with multiple network platforms is Preferred Experience working with multiple network lines of service is Required Experience dealing with customers is Required
